h2.a: ALERT: Illinois Schools remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year, remote learning to continue

div.p: Information & resources on Remote Learning, food, wifi, Chromebook support, etc. for Champaign Unit 4 Schools

h3.a: Unit 4 Board of Education Approves Three Appointments Monday

div.p: CHAMPAIGN, Ill. – The Champaign Unit 4 School District announced approval of three appointments during its Board of Education meeting Monday night.

h3.a: Due to COVID-19 precautions, Unit 4's Board of Education meeting on Mon., April 27 will be conducted virtually

h2.em: In person attendance will comply with CDC guidelines and state mandate for social distancing
